title: Welcome!

title: About
text:
We are a group of scientist and researchers from both industry and academia passionate about solving complex, multi-dimensional problems in drug development using scientifically rigorous approaches based on mathematical and statistical modeling, and novel data analytic techniques based on artificial intelligence and machine learning.
We see value in integration of scientific fields, collaborative research, and promotion of the philosophy of statistical thinking and statistical leadership in drug development.
